answer: The problem or gap in understanding the dimensional crossover in Hubbard ladders motivates the current study, which requires background information on the half-filled and lightly doped N-leg Hubbard ladders (cond-mat/0103159).
explanation: This paper is relevant because it studies the dimensional crossover from 1D to 2D in half-filled and lightly doped Hubbard ladders, providing necessary background information on the phenomenon.
evidence_quote: Dimensional crossover in half-filled and lightly doped N-leg Hubbard ladders
